page.title: 20 CREDITS
page.content: { Four schools}contributed to this disc for the{Domesday Project. {1)ST.ALBANS-}Mrs.J.Herritty,Clare Davies,Louise Davies,Kathryn Street, Michelle Gordon and Zoe Howells. {2)GEORGE STREET JNR.-}Mr.B.Jones,Mark Wells,Michael Gulliford,Lee Gill,Dean Evans,Claire Wilcox,Nathen Wilcox,Jo- anne Hardy,Paul Garvey,Adam Jeremiah, Timothy MOrgan,Fong on Lau,Paul Jenk- ins,Angelina White,Emma Williams,Juli- an Bowen and Kelly Taylor. {3)PONTNEWYNYDD PRIMARY-}Miss S.Locke, Jonathan Pitman,Emma Lawrence,David Powell,Shaun Moore,Rhys Steigerwald, Donna Needs,Mark Jaynes,Murdina Hather -all,Jason Watkins and Bethan Cobner. {4)VICTORIA PRIMARY-}Mr.M.Powell,Ruth Dare,Ian Matthews,Gareth Price,Hannah Price,Kevin Sweeting and Martyn Wool- fall Also headteachers,other teachers etc.e
